page.title: 09Pontefract Open Cast Mine(2)
page.content: The people of Ridgeley Hill met and talked about the Open Cast Mine. They decided to draw up a petition to try and stop Open Casting. It did not work. Reasons for taking the petition around were 1. They did not want the dirt. 2. They did not want a public footpath destroying. As the petition did not work they chose 3 people to put forward complaints to the N.C.B.,while the Open Casting was in progress. Three people meet with the N.C.B. every 8 weeks to try to reslove the problems. Things discussed are a) strength of blasting b) the amount of dust c) height of the burden d) how much coal to be taken out. The Liason Committee wish that the mine was not there and they are looking forward to it being fields again.
